pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today,  the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico.

The leaders discussed the ongoing negotiations to modernize the North America Free Trade Agreement and reiterated their commitment to conclude a modern, mutually beneficial agreement as soon as possible.

The leaders agreed to keep in contact on this issue in the coming weeks.
